briefTitle: Comparison of Intranasal Kovacaine Mist, Tetracaine Alone, and Placebo for Anesthetizing Maxillary Teeth in Adults
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Groups Clinical Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Intranasally Administered Kovacaine Mist to Tetracaine Alone and to Placebo for Anesthetizing Maxillary Teeth in Adults
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of Kovacaine Mist, Tetracaine only, and Placebo for inducing pulpal anesthesia of the maxillary teeth in adults.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Completed the Study Dental Procedure After Without Need for Rescue by Injection of Local Anesthetic.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: at 15 minutes with a 3 minute window
